Class BombGuy

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameObject
      • demolition.Player
        • demolition.BombGuy

  • public class BombGuy
extends Player
    The BombGuy class is the character that user can control and interact with the game, it is inherited from Player

    • Constructor Detail

      • BombGuy

        public BombGuy(int x,
               int y,
               int matrixX,
               int matrixY,
               Wall[][] wallMap)
        Constructor for BombGuy inherited from Player
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the BombGuy
        y - y-coordinate of the BombGuy
        matrixX - the grid position x of the BombGuy, it indicates which row the BombGuy is in
        matrixY - the grid position y of the BombGuy, it indicates which column the BombGuy is in
        wallMap - the 2-D array that store all the wall object and its child
        See Also:
        Player(int, int, int, int, demolition.Wall[][]), GameObject, Wall
